meanings.definition: To look back on or review past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: She retrospects on her childhood memories every night before bed.
meanings.sent2: He often retrospects on his mistakes to learn from them.
meanings.sent3: The old man retrospects on his youth with a smile.
meanings.sent4: As the year ends, she retrospects on all the challenges she overcame.
meanings.sent5: Retrospecting on past experiences can help us grow and improve.

meanings.definition: The act of contemplating or reviewing past events or situations.
meanings.sent1: Her retrospects on the good old days bring a sense of nostalgia.
meanings.sent2: The retrospects of the war are displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The book club's retrospects on classic novels are always lively.
meanings.sent4: In the quiet library, the retrospects of history whisper their tales.
meanings.sent5: The museum's exhibit offers a fascinating retrospects of ancient civilizations.
